original_text: But since they could see the man who had been healed standing there with them, there was nothing they could say.
korean_text: 또 병 나은 사람이 그들과 함께 서 있는 것을 보고 비난할 말이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: the man who had been healed

sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 함께那里에 서 있는 것을

sentences.original_text: there was nothing they could say
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 말할 수 있는 것이 아무것도 없었다
